1.title: Wine Country Grill
1.plot: The connection with wine and barbecue has been around for millenia. Vines are used for fuel and wine for marinades and sauces. Recipes include: Grapevine-Grilled Chicken Breasts and Wine-MarinatedFlank Steak.

2.title: Steak and Beyond
2.plot: Not only do you want to know how to grill appetizers and desserts, what you really want to know is how to grill the perfect steak. From the different cuts and cooking techniques to other types of items like lamb and fish. Recipes include: Dry-Brined Ribeyes, 80-Day Dry Aged Ribeye, Wagu Ribeye and Grilled Lamb Steaks.

3.title: Fish Hits the Fire
3.plot: 'Fish on the grill' scares most novice grill people. Here you are shown each step of the process to help you fear-less. Recipies include: Singapore-Spiced Halibut, Whole Grilled Branzino, Grilled Oysters and New School Coulibiac.

4.title: The Pacific Rim
4.plot: The Pacific Rim extends from California around to Japan. The name of the game in this region is flavor. Recipes include: Thai Sweet Chili Ribs, Shrimp and Pineapple Salad and Lemongrass Chicken Bites.

5.title: Grill Top Cocktail Party
5.plot: No one watches your oven or stove but you are the star once your grill is fired up. Recipes include: Plantation Shrimp with Spiced Rum Glaze, Finger Burner Lamb Chops, Smoked Nectarine Bellinis and Catalan Grilled Tomato Bread.

6.title: Fusion Q
6.plot: Call it what you want but this is what you get when authentic ethnic grilling meets traditional American barbecue. Recipes include: So-Cal Paella, 21-day Dry-Aged Duck and Pork Loin Reuben.

7.title: One Good Turn
7.plot: Spit roasting is one of Steven's favorite forms of cooking. Here we tackle rotisserie cooking with big flavor and no flare ups. Recipes include: Peruvian Game Hens with Creamy Salsa Verde, Huli-Huli Spare Ribs and Brazilian Rotisserie Pineapple.

8.title: Grilling 24/7
8.plot: Here we show grills to smokers from dawn til dusk, we are grilling every meal 24/7. Recipes include: Grilled Eggs with Prosciutto and Parmesan, Skirt Steak Pizza, South African Grilled Cheese and Pastrami Beef Ribs.

9.title: Extreme Grilling
9.plot: Long before grills and smokers there was fire. This is cooking without a grill of grill grate. Recipes include: Salmon Grilled on a Shovel, Pork Tomahawk, Caveman Pork Chops with Poblano Pan-Fry and Cedar Plank Brownie S'mores.

10.title: Wrangler Tailgate
10.plot: The first tailgating party was in 1869 on the back of horse-drawn wagons. We are tailgating Wrangler style here at the ranch. Recipes include: Honey Soy Chicken Wings, Lamb Lettuce Cups, Peruvian Potato Salad and Brisket Tacos.

11.title: So-Cal Grill
11.plot: Healthy cooking, local ingredients and rich California flavors all add up to Southern California grilling. Recipes include: Santa Maria Tri-Tip with 3-Herb Chimichurri, Grilled Tuna Tacos, Grilled Artichokes with Charred Meyer Lemon Aioli and Santa Barbara Lobsters with Orange Mint Mojo.

12.title: Raichlen's Rules
12.plot: For 20 years Steven has traveled the globe learning about the world of grilling. He then shared his tips and techniques with us through shows and books. We now will review His Raichlen's Rules to help better our skills. Tips include: Seasoning, Direct Grilling, Indirect Grilling, Spit-Roasting, Smoking and Caveman Grilling. Recipes include: Wood-Grilled Beef Tomahawk with Blue Cheese Butter, Parmesan-Crusted Hasselback Potatoes, Smoked Ice Cream with Rum Raisin Sauce, Caveman Corn and Dragon's Breath Cocktail.

locations: Alisal Guest Ranch & Resort - 1054 Alisal Rd, Solvang, California, USA::(on location)
imdb.title: Steven Raichlen's Project Fire
